text: Gil Cuerva is a Filipino-Spanish actor and model. Cuerva appeared in his debut television remake of the hit South Korean romantic comedy series, My Love from the Star in 2017. He played one of the leading characters. The show aired on GMA Network. In 2017, he was nominated as the Best New Male TV Personality by 31st PMPC Star Awards for Television. == References == Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino movie actors Category:Actors from Manila Category:Filipino models
title: Gil Cuerva
